A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A nihilistic hash that sets out to demolish the legacy of Star Wars. It's too bad that the current political agenda of the writer/director overwhelmed the desire to tell a good story\, but in fact treat the original story line as something that actively needed to be destroyed and replaced.  Aside from that\, the plot holes\, discontinuities\, rewriting of characters like Luke and meaningless of it all are so maddeningly bad. Such a shame and wasted opportunity.
